  create_table "cards", :force => true do |t|
    t.column "rubber_band_id", :integer,                 :null => false
    t.column "front_side",     :string,  :default => "", :null => false
    t.column "back_side",      :text,    :default => "", :null => false

  add_index "cards", ["rubber_band_id"], :name => "fk_cards_rubber_bands"

  create_table "rubber_bands", :force => true do |t|

  add_index "rubber_bands", ["subject_id"], :name => "fk_rubber_bands_subjects"

  create_table "subjects", :force => true do |t|
